name: Wedding Vowels
description:
Join together words letter by letter to write the vows for your train wedding.

If you get stuck, each level has a guaranteed word you can spell to proceed. Scroll to the bottom of the description for a list of them by level.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam! The theme was "Joined Together".

---

CONTROLS:

m to mute (m)usic

n to mute all audio (n)ow

space/enter to continue or speed up dialogue

A/D or left/right to steer

---

CREDITS:

Music: "coyote conductor" by Louie Zong

https://soundcloud.com/louie-zong/coyote-conductor

Dictionary: Princeton's WordNet

https://wordnet.princeton.edu/

---

Guaranteed Words:

Adjective: Loving

Noun: Candy

Verb: Complete

Adverb: Slowly
